Package org.apache.heron.api.grouping

Interface StreamGrouping

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CustomStreamGrouping
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllStreamGrouping, CustomStreamGroupingDelegate, CustomStreamGroupingDelegate, DirectStreamGrouping, FieldsStreamGrouping, GlobalStreamGrouping, JoinCustomGrouping, NoneStreamGrouping, ReduceByKeyAndWindowCustomGrouping, RemapCustomGrouping, ShuffleStreamGrouping
    public interface StreamGrouping
extends java.io.Serializable
    This is the interface of stream grouping at runtime the tasks in the target bolt.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      TopologyAPI.InputStream.Builder buildStream​(java.lang.String componentName, java.lang.String streamId)
      Create an InputStream Builder object with the corresponding grouping logic.

    • Method Detail

      • buildStream

        TopologyAPI.InputStream.Builder buildStream​(java.lang.String componentName,
                                            java.lang.String streamId)
        Create an InputStream Builder object with the corresponding grouping logic.
        Parameters:
        componentName - The parent component of this grouping logic
        streamId - The id of the input stream
        Returns:
        An InputStream builder to be used by BoltDeclarer
